titleStmt.title: Two sheets for poor families ... by Richard Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert White for Francis Tyton ... and for Nevill Simmons ...,

notesStmt.note: Pt. 1 has subtitle: The first, instructions to the ungodly for their conversion; pt. 2 has special t.p. with title: Instructions for a holy life.
Copy at reel 201:18 (B1441) is complete work; copy at reel 269:6 (B1403) is pt. 2 only.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
